title: TaskFlow
description: A productivity app for teams with offline-first sync.

details.overview: TaskFlow is a collaborative task management application designed for modern teams. It features real-time synchronization, offline support, and intuitive drag-and-drop interfaces.
features: Real-time collaboration with multiple team members
challenges: Optimizing real-time updates for large teams
details.results: Reduced team coordination time by 40% and improved task completion rates by 25%.

title: InsightBoard
description: Lightweight analytics dashboards, ready in minutes.

details.overview: InsightBoard provides instant analytics dashboards for businesses of all sizes. Setup takes minutes, not weeks, with pre-built templates and custom data connectors.
features: Pre-built templates for common business metrics
challenges: Optimizing query performance for large datasets
details.results: Dashboard setup time reduced from weeks to minutes, serving 500+ active users.
